translation.ko: 제 걱정은 코로나가 언제 끝날지가 아니라

translation.en: but when will all the other pandemics end?
[in English] Right now, I'm in Overtown.
The tropical storm has been upgraded to a hurricane.
There are tornado warnings.
The City of Miami or the county,

No one offered them a temporary place to stay or an evacuation route.
translation.ko: 임시 거처나 탈출 경로 어느 것도 제공하지 않았어요

translation.en: [in Spanish] I have kids. I'm exposing myself to the virus.
translation.ko: 전 아이들이 있는데 바이러스에 노출돼 있어요

translation.en: When I spoke to the security,

translation.ko: 누구나 바이러스가 있고 어차피 다 죽는대요

translation.en: That's their security person.
Mamá.
[Dr. Lopez in Spanish] I have a headache,
my throat hurts, and I have a fever.
I'm scared.
[man on TV in English] Each death serves as a reminder
translation.ko: 각각의 죽음은 우리에게 포기하지 말라고 말합니다

translation.en: that we must stand firm in our resolve.
translation.ko: 각각의 죽음은 우리에게 포기하지 말라고 말합니다 "코로나바이러스 정례 브리핑"

translation.en: Sadly, these deaths figures include NHS colleagues
translation.ko: "코로나바이러스 정례 브리핑" 슬프게도 사망자 중엔 국가 보건 서비스 직원과

translation.en: and colleagues who work in social care.
They dedicated their lives to caring for others.
Today, I'm able to announce
that the government is setting up a life assurance scheme
translation.ko: 최전선에서 일하는 NHS와 사회복지 종사자들을 위한

translation.en: for NHS and social care frontline colleagues.
We want to do everything that we can
to support families who are dealing with this grief.
[Hassan] So, the government, they said that NHS staff,
if they die, their family will be given indefinite leave to remain.
-They will be given indefinite stay-- -Invulnerabilities.
Except cleaners and porters…
and ward hosts and social care workers.
translation.ko: 병동 식사 담당, 사회 복지 업무는 제외한대요

translation.en: So, essentially, if a migrant worker dies fighting the pandemic,
translation.ko: 결국 이주 노동자가 전염병과 싸우다 죽으면

translation.en: their families get nothing. They could also be at risk of deportation.
translation.ko: 유가족은 아무 보상 없이 추방의 위기에 처하게 됩니다

translation.en: And we're not talking about one or two people here,
we're talking about thousands, if not tens of thousands of people,
the bedrock of the NHS.
And I'm genuinely struggling to see how this is fair.
translation.ko: NHS의 근간이 되는 사람들 얘기죠 공정한 처사인지 의문이 듭니다

translation.en: -It's not fair -It's not nice.
It's unfair that doctors and nurses are treated differently.
And we do the same thing.
Without porters, they can't operate.
If you don't clean here, you would smell it.
We are closer… to the disease than the doctors and everybody,
translation.ko: 우린 의사들보다 더 질병에 가까이 있어요

translation.en: because we are cleaning the bed, we are cleaning the whole--
the disease the patients have.
It's so sad, because they don't care about us.
translation.ko: 정부가 우리는 상관 않는다니 정말 슬프네

translation.en: We are the low-key workers.
They don't care about us, it's not fair.
[Renata in Portuguese] To the government, we don't exist.
We are cheap labor, that's all.
[male reporter] Brazil has recorded the highest number of deaths
from coronavirus in a 24-hour period.
Total cases are now at almost half a million.
[Renata] The pandemic is not the problem.
The pandemic was just another factor
that added to what the people on the margins already have to live with.
translation.ko: 그들이 안고 있는 문제에 문제를 하나 더 얹은 거뿐이죠

translation.en: [woman on the phone] I was hospitalized, so was my husband.
I went back home, but unfortunately my husband didn't have the same chance
translation.ko: 난 집에 돌아왔지만 남편은 그러지 못하고

translation.en: and ended up passing away.
It's been very difficult for me.
Close ones are losing the battle.
[Renata] We are not angry. We are outraged.
-[woman in English] Check his right-- -[man 1] No, check his pulse.
-[man 2] Get back on the sidewalk. -[man 1] The man ain't moved yet.
-[man 1] Is he breathing right now? -[woman] He's handcuffed. He's not moving!
translation.ko: - 숨은 쉬나요? - 수갑을 찼고, 안 움직여요!

translation.en: [female reporter] Hundreds are flooding onto the streets of Minneapolis tonight
following the release of a video showing an officer
translation.ko: 경찰이 조지 플로이드의 목을 무릎으로 누른

translation.en: kneeling on George Floyd's neck during his arrest.
translation.ko: 체포 영상을 보고 거리로 나온 시위대입니다

translation.en: It's been going through my head over and over again,
and I keep asking myself, what can I do? Because I know that I've got to do something.
translation.ko: 계속 자문했죠, '뭘 할 수 있지?' 뭐라도 해야 합니다

translation.en: A man lost his life in Minnesota.
Somebody stood on his neck for eight minutes.
translation.ko: 누군가 그의 목 위에 8분간 서 있었습니다!

translation.en: Eight minutes!
[man in Portuguese] Raise your right fist.
-Say, "I am… from the hood!" -[crowd] I am…
I am… favela!
-I am… favela! I am… more! More! -I am… more!
translation.ko: - 나는 빈민가다! 그리고! - 나는 빈민가다! 그리고!

translation.en: More! More than a winner!
[man in English] I believe that we will win!
[all] I believe that we will win! I believe that we will win!
[in Portuguese] They talk so much about sanitation, cleaning and hand hygiene.
translation.ko: 정부 입으로 위생과 청결을 그렇게 강조하면서

translation.en: But we still have our water turned off every night.
translation.ko: 매일 밤 우리 동네 물은 끊어버려요

translation.en: There are places in the community that don't have water after 8:00 p.m.,
and it's only back the next morning at 6:00 a.m.
How can the virus not proliferate in this situation?
[in English] COVID-19 is killing people.
It's killing Black people more than it's killing other people.
Other things are killing Black people too.
Police officers are killing Black people.
The health care system is killing Black people.
-Black Lives! -[all] Matter! -Black Lives! -[all] Matter!
Black Lives!
For months we've been catering
to the most vulnerable population in Miami-Dade County.
translation.ko: 마이애미데이드 카운티의 취약 계층에 급식을 제공했습니다

translation.en: And while I was doing that I got arrested.
Let me tell you what happened after that.
We found out that the officer that racially profiled me,
that arrested me, had 12 use of force complaints.
He has six civilian complaints.
Who the fuck is holding them accountable?
translation.ko: 그래서 누가 그들에게 책임을 묻고 있나요?

translation.en: -[crowd] Nobody! -Nobody!
We gotta hold them accountable.
It's our job to hold them accountable. How can we hold them accountable?
We gotta elect a whole new people in our justice system.
-Black lives! -[all] Matter!
[all in Portuguese] One, two, three, four, five… a thousand!
We are the G10 of favelas in Brazil.
[man] We're having a peaceful demonstration.
Indeed, and I thank you for your efforts.
-We have the right to go further. -My superiors said it's not possible.
translation.ko: - 우린 더 갈 권리가 있어요 - 위에서 그건 안 된다네요

translation.en: We want to speak with the governor. He's obligated to see us.
translation.ko: 주지사와 만나야 해요 우릴 만날 의무가 있다고요

translation.en: Listen, you will not go through.
Hold on. Stop here.
-So, when we said we see you! -[all] So, when we said we see you!
-We see you! -[all] We see you!
[man in Portuguese] We got our response.
The governor is too busy and won't be able to speak with us!
[in English] Hello, Mr. Prime Minister.
My name's Hassan Akkad and I am proudly working as a cleaner
translation.ko: 저는 하산 아카드라고 합니다 총리님이 입원하셨던 병원 근처 병원에서 청소원으로 일하죠

translation.en: in a hospital ten miles away from the hospital which you were in.
translation.ko: 총리님이 입원하셨던 병원 근처 병원에서 청소원으로 일하죠

translation.en: I joined around the same time, actually,
because I wanted to help this nation overcome this pandemic.
translation.ko: 영국이 팬데믹을 극복하는 데 도움이 되고 싶었거든요

translation.en: Today, however, I felt betrayed, stabbed in the back.
translation.ko: 하지만 전 오늘 심한 배신감을 느꼈습니다

translation.en: I felt shocked to find out that you've decided,
your government decided, to exclude myself, and my colleagues,
who work as cleaners and porters and social care workers who are…
translation.ko: 저와 제 동료들을 배제하신 결정에 대해서요

translation.en: We are all on minimum wage.
You've decided to exclude us from the bereavement scheme.
So, if I die fighting coronavirus, my partner isn't allowed--
translation.ko: 제가 코로나와 싸우다 사망하면 제 배우자는 영주권을 받지 못하게 되는 거죠

translation.en: isn't allowed an indefinite leave to remain.
translation.ko: 제 배우자는 영주권을 받지 못하게 되는 거죠

translation.en: This is your way of saying thank you to us.
Please reconsider, and I hope to hear back from you. Thank you.
[Renata in Portuguese] It is inhumane to get halfway and be stopped
by a fascist government that wants their people to die.
Thank you.
Cousins.
It's early.
"Shamed by this hospital…"
Shamed? Why did they write that?
Because yesterday, when I did a letter to Boris Johnson,
translation.ko: 어제 제가 존슨 총리에게 영상 편지를 보내고

translation.en: they changed the rules.
[Gimba] "Refugee wins right for his family to remain if he dies on the front line."
translation.ko: "난민, 전선에서 사망 시 유가족 영주권 권리를 획득하다"

translation.en: It was viewed five million times.
And shared tens of thousands of times, and--
And after four hours of putting it out, the government U-turned.
translation.ko: 영상을 올린 지 4시간 만에 정부가 입장을 바꿔

translation.en: They announced that they are including everyone in the bereavement scheme.
The cleaning job is not
part of the job you are doing, it's a temporary job for you.
-But for me, it's my life. -Yeah.
It's my job, I'm doing it all the time.
But I appreciate… I very appreciate the way you've done it.
-I'm gonna do this. -Yeah.
-I know, because we can't-- [laughs] -We cannot hug.
But hopefully…
[female reporter in Portuguese] Protests happening in at least 140 American cities
translation.ko: 경찰 체포 과정에서 비무장 흑인 청년이 사망하자

translation.en: after the death of an unarmed Black man in police custody.
[Renata] Only Black people know how difficult it is
to have to prove yourself to people every day.
You have to prove that you are good, prove that you are a lawful person,
translation.ko: 착하고 법을 지키는 사람이란 걸 증명하고

translation.en: prove that you are clean, that your hair is clean,
that you bought your own clothes,
and if you have a nice phone that you paid for it.
translation.ko: 자기 돈으로 샀다는 걸 증명해야 하죠

translation.en: And… "I can't breathe" needs to give way to
"I am here and I am breathing."
translation.ko: '난 살아 숨 쉬고 있다'라는 말이 맞는 거죠

translation.en: -[all] Say their names! -Dante Parker!
Say my son's name! Marcus Brown!
We're fighting for humanity right now.
We're asking everyone all over the world to stand with us and fight with us.
[woman] We're standing together as human beings
translation.ko: "불편을 드려 죄송합니다 세상을 바꾸는 중이에요" 모든 인류의 번영을 위해 연대하는 거죠

translation.en: for all of humanity to thrive.
translation.ko: 모든 인류의 번영을 위해 연대하는 거죠

translation.en: We need changes, big changes.
We want justice for everyone, in Kenya, or all over the world.
translation.ko: 전 세계 모든 이들의 정의를 기원합니다

translation.en: Is this justice?
[all] No justice, no peace! No justice, no peace!
[in Portuguese] We are few of the many who will rise.
-[in English] Keep going! -Keep going!
We are rising up, telling the whole world that enough is enough.
translation.ko: 이제 더는 안 된다고 세상에 말합니다

translation.en: We are united!
[all] We are united! We are united!
[female reporter] In a landmark moment in the fight against the coronavirus pandemic,
the UK medicines regulator has approved the coronavirus vaccine
developed by AstraZeneca and scientists at Oxford University.
translation.ko: 옥스퍼드 대학이 개발한 백신 사용을 승인했습니다

translation.en: -Hello. -Hello.
[man] There has been a huge amount of excitement globally about a vaccine.
translation.ko: 백신에 대해 전 세계가 기대가 큽니다

translation.en: It's the only thing that's likely to get us out of this.
We've known that since the beginning.
[woman] Is it a jump-up-and-down moment? Is it a punch the air moment?
Not really, no. [laughs] It was more of a relief.
It's not the end of this process.
The thing to focus on is that there are three vaccines now
translation.ko: 지금 집중해야 하는 건 효능을 보인 백신이

translation.en: that have demonstrated really high efficacy, and this is great news.
translation.ko: 세 가지라는 건데 그건 좋은 소식이지만

translation.en: We need probably more than three vaccines if we're going to protect the whole world.
translation.ko: 전 세계를 보호하려면 그 이상이 필요합니다

translation.en: Could it, arguably, be the vaccine that will make more of a difference globally
than the other ones we've seen so far?
translation.ko: 더 큰 성과를 가져올 수 있을까요?

translation.en: This is not the most expensive vaccine to manufacture, by a long way,
translation.ko: 이건 생산 비용이 가장 비싼 백신도 아니고

translation.en: and also be able to deploy it without having to store it frozen.
That means it can feed into existing vaccine supply distribution networks--
translation.ko: 덕분에 기존의 백신 공급 경로를 활용할 수 있죠

translation.en: [Prof. Gilbert] What I'd like to happen after this
is the recognition of the fact that this approach works.
We can do it much more quickly than we've done it in the past,
translation.ko: 과거보다 더 빨리 더 적은 비용으로

translation.en: and it doesn't have to be hugely expensive either.
And I would like to be able to apply that to solve a lot of other problems.
translation.ko: 다른 많은 문제 해결에도 적용되었으면 해요

translation.en: My confidence in the science remains strong,
even though this pandemic has shown having the right science
translation.ko: 비록 이번 팬데믹을 통해 과학만으로 공중보건 위기를 해결할 순 없음을 깨달았지만요

translation.en: is only one part of the solution to any public health crisis.
translation.ko: 과학만으로 공중보건 위기를 해결할 순 없음을 깨달았지만요

translation.en: [Dr. Tedros] For me, COVID-19 is a call, a clear call.
A call that is telling us to really behave.
To behave as a global community.
COVID-19 has taken so much from us,
but it's also giving us an opportunity to break with the past
translation.ko: 그 와중에 얻은 것도 있습니다 과거와 결별하고 더 나은 세상을 만들 기회죠

translation.en: and build back better.
translation.ko: 과거와 결별하고 더 나은 세상을 만들 기회죠

translation.en: I want us to see this as opportunity.
It's a crisis.
But opportunities are born from crises.
[in Farsi] Take that side.
Look how nice this looks now.
It needs guests.
It's calling for guests.
[in Hindi] You okay? No?
I am afraid.
-[indistinct chatter] -[panting] Give me your hand.
[Nupur] My unborn little angel.
I'm writing this letter to you,
a week before you will arrive into this beautiful and broken world.
translation.ko: 네가 오기 일주일 전 이 편지를 쓴다

translation.en: [Nupur] Get me out of here.
[Nupur] I wonder if you can hear me now.
I know that this journey was a difficult one for you.
[man] Now he'll give you a small injection to make your lower body numb.
translation.ko: 하반신 마취를 위해 주사를 놓을 거예요

translation.en: [Nupur] Some days, I am so scared.
Scared that we are not good enough,
and scared that maybe it's unfair
to bring you into a place with so much suffering.
translation.ko: 널 데려오는 게 가혹한 일일까 봐

translation.en: [woman] It's a little baby boy!
Here you are.
[Nupur] One day, when you are older,
your father and I will be able to tell you about the world you were born into.
translation.ko: 너 태어날 때 얘기를 네 아빠와 같이 들려줄게

translation.en: Your birth is a true ray of hope.
You have a chance to help rebuild the world
translation.ko: 넌 세상을 다시 세울 수 있어

translation.en: with love and compassion.
[man in Spanish] Good morning. How are you doing, sir?
We're doctors. Thanks, you're very kind.
-Don't worry. -How could I not?
How are you, my darlings?
Better, but I'm tired.
[woman] Several colleagues have relapsed.
They got better, relapsed, and now they're hospitalized.
[Dr. Lopez] I thought I was going to go back to work today.
But it's not so simple, because I've had pneumonia.
Is that my ICU list or is it someone else's?
[woman] You were sorely missed in the ICU.
You're the only one who knows how to organize things.
Your husband also had it?
[Dr. Lopez] I infected him. Well, not really.
We got infected by our housekeeper.
You can imagine everything that went through my head.
Being in charge of the ICU and everything else.
I questioned the example I would be setting my staff.
Everything I thought about.
To get infected at home!
But it's over.
Goodbye, girls, thank you.
[Renata in Portuguese] Since we buried my mother,
I've avoided coming back to this place for as long as possible.
translation.ko: 이곳을 다시 찾지 않으려고 계속 피했어요

translation.en: It's here.
Cherry quarter, sector 15.
My brother and my mother are just a number now.
This plaque has my brother's name.
We still need to do a plaque with my mom's name.
Their new home.
Both my mother and Rogério…
When I fucked up, he was the guy who'd say,
translation.ko: 제가 큰 실수를 했을 때 오빠는 이렇게 말했죠

translation.en: "It's done. Now keep going. Don't look back. Keep walking."
translation.ko: '다 지난 일이니' '계속 나아가 돌아보지 말고 앞만 보고 가'

translation.en: And my mom, when I fucked up, she'd look at me and say,
translation.ko: 하지만 엄마는 절 보고 이렇게 말했죠

translation.en: "I can't believe it, but I'm here for you."
translation.ko: '믿을 수 없구나 그래도 난 네 편이야'

translation.en: This made me who I am today.
I leave here in peace…
translation.ko: 이제 제가 옳은 일을 한다는 확신을 갖고

translation.en: with the certainty that I'm doing things right.
It is nothing different from what you would want me to do.
[Mohammad in Farsi] What a beautiful bird!
[Sara] Oh, so lovely! So pretty, my dear!
translation.ko: - 새 정말 예쁘다 - 정말! 너무 예뻐

translation.en: [Mohammad] She flew down so softly like this.
When we're little,
everything is so magical for us.
I'd like us all to…
rediscover wonder in the ordinary again.
Like feeling the touch
of our parents' hands.
Embracing them.
If I could hug someone I love again.
[in English] So, I'm going to drive you home. But…
-But what? -But, we gotta--
We're gonna take a quick detour. There's something I want to show you.
translation.ko: 잠깐 어디 좀 들렀다 갈게요 보여드릴 게 있어요

translation.en: It won't take long, I promise.
-So, I brought you all the way here-- -Yeah?
Because I wanted to show you this.
Oh, my God. Oh, fuckin' Lord.
-What? -[laughing]
-Ah! -Gimba.
Can you believe that?
Oh, my-- I can't believe this. Don't make me cry now.
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼 사람 울리지 마

translation.en: -I wish I could hug you. -I know.
translation.ko: - 안아줄 수 있음 좋을 텐데 - 알아

translation.en: "Gimba, the ward host."
[Sara in Farsi] This virus, it has tested us.
translation.ko: 이 바이러스가 우릴 시험에 들게 하고

translation.en: It's changed us all.
[Mohammad] My dear, you know, when this year began,
I thought it would be the year
I got all the things I wanted.
translation.ko: 원하는 걸 다 이루는 한 해가 될 거라고

translation.en: Now I know it's the year I appreciate everything I already have.
translation.ko: 대신 가진 것에 감사하는 해가 됐지

translation.en: [in English] We're gonna hear from people we serve at the shower site. They want to say a couple words.
translation.ko: 위생 센터를 이용하신 분들의 말씀을 들어보겠습니다

translation.en: I got more love inside this gate than I got out there in Overtown.
translation.ko: 여기서 오버타운에서보다 더 큰 사랑을 받았습니다

translation.en: I see the light at the end of the tunnel now.
[Dr. Henderson] We try to dream about a society in which we live in
translation.ko: 우린 살고 싶은 사회를 꿈꾸고 그려보죠
